mapper.select: select * from (select a.InBillID,a.TimeIn,b.GoodsID,b.Type,b.ItemNum,b.ItemPrice,b.ItemTotal,b.StorePosition,a.Operator,a.StoreManager,a.Checker,a.TableMaker,a.CheckStatus,a.Buyer from InBill as a left join ItemsIn as b on a.InBillID = b.InBillID) as show where InBillID = #{InBillID}
mapper.update: update InBill set CheckStatus = #{CheckStatus},CheckTime= #{CheckTime},CheckMessage=#{checkMessage},Checker=#{Checker} where InBillID = #{InBillID}
mapper.select: select a.*,b.ItemsName,b.ItemsUnit,c.CategoryName from ItemsIn as a left join Goods as b on a.GoodsID = b.GoodsID left join Category as c on a.CategoryID =c.CategoryID where InBillID = #{InBillID}
